name: HSP_ACCT_OCUR_HAR
description: This table contains the Occurrence Codes and Occurrence Dates for a Hospital Accounts Receivable (HAR) record.

columns.name: ACCT_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the hospital account.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: This column stores the line number in the results of a query. Because multiple occurrence codes can be stored in one hospital account, each code will have a unique line number.

columns.name: OCCURRENCE_CODE_C_NAME
columns.description: An occurrence code stored in the hospital account.

columns.name: OCCURRENCE_DATE
columns.description: The date associated with an occurrence code stored in the hospital account.
